mapper.select: select m.PERMS from T_ROLE r left join T_USER_ROLE ur on(r.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID) left join T_USER u on(u.USER_ID = ur.USER_ID) left join T_ROLE_MENU rm on(rm.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID) left join T_MENU m on(m.MENU_ID = rm.MENU_ID ) where u.USERNAME = #{userName} and m.PERMS is not null and m.PERMS <> ''

select m.* from T_MENU m where m.TYPE <> 1 and m.MENU_ID in (select distinct rm.MENU_ID from T_ROLE_MENU rm left join T_ROLE r on(rm.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID) left join T_USER_ROLE ur on(ur.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID) left join T_USER u on (u.USER_ID = ur.USER_ID) where u.USERNAME = #{userName}) order by m.CREATE_TIME
